title: Preview: Streetfest London 2013
body:
On Sunday 5th May, Streetfest is putting on another explosive amalgamation of “street art” and live music.

The event, which is entering its 6th year, plays host to a number of exciting artists.

The one I’m most “hyped” about is headliner Oddisee. The barsmith has been putting out consistently excellent music for a couple of years and it’ll be interesting to see how his music works in a live setting.

Aside from the American rapper, there are a number of British MCs on the line-up, with Dot Rotten being the most prominent. You can also catch performances from the likes of DJ Vadim & DJ Nikki Beatnik, Livin Proof and Supa Dupa Fly.

You can find further information about Streetfest and buy tickets [here](http://www.streetfest.net/).
